Package gw.cc.specialhandling.entity

package gw.cc.specialhandling.entity
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    AccountSpecialHandling
    AccountSpecialHandling The special handling to follow for claims linked to a given Account
    AutomatedActivityHandler
    AutomatedActivityHandler A subtype of AutomatedHandler that causes activities to be generated when the associated trigger is executed by changes to a Claim.
    AutomatedHandler
    AutomatedHandler This entity is the superclass for the two types of Special Handling automated handlers, one for generating email notifications and one for generating activities.
    AutomatedNotificationHandler
    AutomatedNotificationHandler A subtype of AutomatedHandler that causes emails to be generated when the associated trigger is executed by changes to a Claim.
    ClaimIndicatorAutomatedActivityHandler
    ClaimIndicatorAutomatedActivityHandler A subtype of Automated Handler that generates an activity when a specified ClaimIndicator for a given Claim changes its value.
    ClaimIndicatorAutomatedNotificationHandler
    ClaimIndicatorAutomatedNotificationHandler A subtype of Automated Handler that generates an email when a specified ClaimIndicator for a given Claim changes its value.
    ClaimIndicatorTrigger
    ClaimIndicatorTrigger A type of special handling trigger whose execution behavior is based on a specified ClaimIndicator and a value for that indicator.
    FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler
    FinancialAutomatedActivityHandler A subtype of Automated Handler that generates an email when a specified FinancialThreshold for a given Claim changes its value.
    FinancialAutomatedNotificationHandler
    FinancialAutomatedNotificationHandler A subtype of Automated Handler that generates an email when a specified FinancialThreshold for a given Claim changes its value.
    FinancialThresholdTrigger
    FinancialThresholdTrigger An automated handler trigger whose execution is dependent on the status of a financial threshold on a Claim
    OtherInstruction
    OtherInstruction Other instructions for account special handling
    SpecialHandling
    SpecialHandling This is the parent entity for defining special handling of Claims.
    SpecialHandlingEmailAddress
    SpecialHandlingEmailAddress An email address associated with a special handling notification rule.
    SpecialHandlingFinancialState
    SpecialHandlingFinancialState Set of previously calculated financial amounts for use by Special Handling for Financials and should not be used beyond that context.
    SpecialHandlingPreviousAmount
    SpecialHandlingPreviousAmount Holds the previously calculated financial amount for use by Special Handling for Financials and should not be used beyond that context.
